nastroje: #.id{border-radius:8px;margin-bottom:24px;overflow:hidden}#.id table{font-family:"Open Sans","Noto Sans HK",sans-serif,Arial;border-collapse:collapse;border-spacing:0;table-layout:fixed;width:100%;text-align:center;font-weight:700}#.id td{font-size:14px;height:70px;overflow:hidden;padding:10px 5px;word-break:normal}#.id th{overflow:hidden;padding:10px 5px;word-break:normal;background-color:#06c25e;color:#fff;font-size:18px;font-weight:600;letter-spacing:1px}#.id .logo{padding-left:20px;background:left 2vw top 4px url(https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/5dbc8667d2d62666f8c901af/5dbc8667d2d6264ae7c90300_logo.svg) no-repeat;background-color:#06c25e}#.id .left{font-size:15px;font-weight:700;color:#06c25e}#.id tr:nth-child(even){background-color:#ebfaf2}#.id img{height:22px}@media only screen and (max-width:600px){#.id th{font-size:3.5vw;letter-spacing:-1px}#.id td{font-size:calc(5px + 1.5vw)}#.id .left{font-size:calc(5px + 1.5vw)}#.id img{height:17px}}
